comment.author: 24583408@N02
comment._content:
This Is not the USS Michigan, the Michigan sister ship to the South Carolina had all turrets on the Center line, one above the other.  
These 2 ships are the first to have this arrangement.
The ship in this picture appears to be a Delaware Class Battleship
with three turrets arranged towards the stern.  
the glass negative says Michigan but its not.
Look Picture of South Carolina and you will see the difference.
